front.title: IPv6 Prefix Delegation routing state maintenance approaches

abstract.t: The maintenance of Prefix Delegation (PD) routing state is an issuethat people have discussed in the IETF DHC WG, and there have beendrafts on the topic. However, as the pros and cons of the differentrouting state maintenance solutions have not been examinedthoroughly, this text attempts to shed some light on both the actualproblem and the various alternative solutions.
